translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、もしや、うぅむ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You, could it be, hmmm..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統閣下に対して、その……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That, towards the Supreme Commander, um..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……懸想などしてないだろうな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You aren't having any romantic feelings, are you?"
"...Kensou?" (romantic feelings?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「男性として恋心を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As a man, feelings of love"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抱いたりはしてないだろうな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You don't have them, do you...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という意味だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's what I mean."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ないよ」
「そ、そうか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-is that so!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、私も考えすぎかとは思ったが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I thought maybe I was overthinking it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、昔は共に冒険した仲かも知れんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed, we may have been companions on adventures in the past,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今や相手の立場も総統閣下。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But now, the other's position is that of the Supreme Commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなことになっては事だな、と……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would be problematic if it became anything like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう、お父さん、心配しすぎだよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, Dad, you're worrying too much..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うむ、それならいいんだがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes, if that's the case, then it's fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、なんにしろ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, in any case,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立場ある方とのお付き合いは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when you are involved with someone who holds a position,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく考えてしなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: think carefully about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、最近シーラ……殿と仲が良いらしいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I hear you've been getting along well with Sheela... the lady, lately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へ？　うん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が台所でパン焼いてたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I was baking bread in the kitchen,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 教えて欲しいって言われて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she asked me to teach her..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その、どういう職の方か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you know, um, what kind of occupation she has...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知っているのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー……気にしたことなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... I never really thought about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも確か、ランスさんの奴隷だって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But if I remember correctly, she said she's Lance's slave..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ってたような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むう、そうか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, is that so...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 失礼のないようにな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Be careful not to be disrespectful..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へ？　うん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Yeah."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And also..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前、最近法王の食事を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard you've been often preparing meals for the Pope lately...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく用意しているそうだな……」
「う、うん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前にお昼ご飯のサンドイッチ食べてたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other day when I was eating a sandwich for lunch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジッと見てたから良かったら作りましょうかって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was staring at it intently, so I offered to make some if he'd like."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、それでね、クルックーさん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, and, Cruccu-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピクルスが特に美味しいって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he said the pickles were especially delicious..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……へ？　何かまずかった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Huh? Was something wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いや、法王がそうお望みなら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no, if that's what the Pope desires..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、粗相だけはないように、な……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, just be sure not to make any mistakes..."
"Y-yeah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが……くっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... ugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胃が痛むかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if in stomach pain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: BSは腹の辺りを手で押さえた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: BS pressed his hand against his abdomen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……脳天気な娘持つと、父親は大変そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Having such a carefree daughter, it seems being a father is tough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、こういう娘に育てたのは自分ですから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I am the one who raised her to be like this."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それと……」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が台所でパン焼いてたら、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she asked me to teach her..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その、どういう職の方か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you know, um, what kind of occupation she has...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知っているのか？」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー……気にしたことなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... I never really thought about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも確か、ランスさんの奴隷だって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But if I remember correctly, she said she's Lance's slave..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ってたような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むう、そうか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, is that so...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 失礼のないようにな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Be careful not to be disrespectful..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へ？　うん」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And also..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前、最近法王の食事を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard you've been often preparing meals for the Pope lately...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく用意しているそうだな……」
「う、うん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前にお昼ご飯のサンドイッチ食べてたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other day when I was eating a sandwich for lunch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジッと見てたから良かったら作りましょうかって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was staring at it intently, so I offered to make some if he'd like."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、それでね、クルックーさん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, and, Cruccu-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピクルスが特に美味しいって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he said the pickles were especially delicious..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……へ？　何かまずかった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Huh? Was something wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いや、法王がそうお望みなら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no, if that's what the Pope desires..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、粗相だけはないように、な……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, just be sure not to make any mistakes..."
"Y-yeah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが……くっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... ugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胃が痛むかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if in stomach pain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: BSは腹の辺りを手で押さえた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: BS pressed his hand against his abdomen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……脳天気な娘持つと、父親は大変そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Having such a carefree daughter, it seems being a father is tough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、こういう娘に育てたのは自分ですから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I am the one who raised her to be like this."
